title: This 'Hum Saath Saath Hai' Spoof Of Jonas Brothers' New Song 'Sucker' Is Too Funny To Miss!
text:
This 'Hum Saath Saath Hai' Spoof Of Jonas Brothers' New Song 'Sucker' Is Too Funny To Miss!
This 'Hum Saath Saath Hai' Spoof Of Jonas Brothers' New Song 'Sucker' Is Too Funny To Miss!
The world is currently rejoicing the reunion of Jonas brothers. Yesterday, the American band dropped their latest single 'Sucker'.
Screengrab
Their comeback video is special also because apart from the popular trio, Nick, Kevin and Joe, the video also starred the real love of their lives Priyanka Chopra, Sophie Turner and Danielle Jonas.
Internet, like always had too many feelings after watching the video. But the one that takes the cake is the Hum Saath Saath Hain spoof. Reacting to the real life jodis in the video, people commented that Suraj Barjatya did this before the Jonas brothers.
Don't Miss 529 SHARES 24.3 K SHARES 17 K SHARES 11.2 K SHARES 9.5 K SHARES
And things escalated quickly as someone even made a spoof video of the Sucker video with the music of Hum Saath Saath Hain.
The result is epic and funny in equal proportions! Watch now.
description: Internet, like always had too many feelings after watching the video. But the one that takes the cake is the Hum Saath Saath Hain spoof. Reacting to the real life jodis in the video, people commented that Suraj Barjatya did this before the Jonas brothers.
